thread.section_title: InnoMax Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InnoMax | innomax.com
thread.title: JULIA & JESSE CONTRERAS
thread.title_full: InnoMax reviewed by JULIA & JESSE CONTRERAS

author: JULIA & JESSE CONTRERAS
title: JULIA & JESSE CONTRERAS
text: We had a great experience and we even brought our 3 year old. They took him under their wings so that we could try out beds with no distractions. We absolutely love our bed but unfortunately one of the pillow we bought is very uncomfortable. Both pillows were supposed to be the same but one is obviously different. We never called to ask for a refund because we were told up front it was against policy. Other than that we had a great experience and would not hesitate to recommend to others.
